title: [Re-checkpointing] Autograd container for trading compute for memory
body_html:
Re-opening this PR since #4594 is consistently failing to load. Ed sent an email to github support about this.

Autograd based checkpoint container for trading compute for memory for various models. Please see the link https://github.com/prigoyal/pytorch_memonger/tree/master/models/optimized for various models optimized using this container and the test are here https://github.com/prigoyal/pytorch_memonger/blob/master/test_memory_optimized.py

Results:
